title: Login via Email and Password - Success
description: Verify user can login successfully using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and password
Click on login button
Check that login completes successfully and dashboard for user role is displayed

title: Login via Email and Password - Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid email or password and proper error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email or incorrect password
Click on login button
Verify login failure with appropriate error message displayed to user

title: Login via Google OAuth - Success
description: Verify user can login successfully using Google OAuth authentication method.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google OAuth login button
Complete Google OAuth flow with valid Google account
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to appropriate dashboard

title: Login via Magic Link - Success
description: Verify user can login using Magic Link sent to registered email.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Submit registered email to request Magic Link
Click Magic Link received in email
Verify user is logged in and redirected to appropriate dashboard

title: Role Based Access Control (RBAC) Enforcement - Admin Access
description: Verify Admin users can access all administrative features including user invitations and reports.

steps.description: Login as Admin user
Navigate to admin dashboard
Verify Admin can access user invitations, permission management, and view system reports

title: Role Based Access Control (RBAC) Enforcement - Fisioterapeuta Access
description: Verify Fisioterapeuta users have access to patient list, edit medical records, body mapping, and session documentation.

steps.description: Login as Fisioterapeuta user
Access patient management and body mapping system
Verify user can edit patient records, record pain points on body map and document session details

title: Role Based Access Control (RBAC) Enforcement - Estagiario Access
description: Verify Estagiario users have restricted access to documentation and follow-up features under supervision.

steps.description: Login as Estagiario user
Try to access restricted areas beyond documentation and follow-up
Verify access is denied for restricted features and allowed for documentation features

title: Role Based Access Control (RBAC) Enforcement - Paciente Portal Access
description: Verify Paciente users can view treatment plans, prescribed exercises and provide feedback via portal.

steps.description: Login as Paciente user
Navigate to patient portal
Verify Paciente can see treatment plans, exercise prescriptions and submit feedback on execution

title: Patient CRUD Operations with CPF Validation and Secure Photo Upload
description: Verify creation, reading, updating, and logical deletion of patient records with CPF validation and secure photo upload.

steps.description: Login as authorized user (Admin or Fisioterapeuta)
Create new patient with valid CPF and upload profile photo
Verify patient record is created and CPF validation passed
Update patient information and photo
Verify updates persist and photo is securely stored
Perform logical deletion of patient record
Verify patient is no longer listed but data is retained for compliance
Attempt to create/edit patient with invalid CPF
Verify system rejects invalid CPF with clear validation error

title: Interactive Body Mapping - Pain Point Registration and Timeline Visualization
description: Verify interactive SVG body map allows recording pain points with scale 0-10 and displays evolution timeline correctly.

steps.description: Login as Fisioterapeuta
Navigate to body mapping page for a patient
Add pain point on body map with valid intensity scale 0-10
Verify pain point is correctly saved and displayed on map
View timeline of pain points evolution
Verify timeline correctly reflects historical progression of pain intensity and points
Attempt to add pain point with intensity outside 0-10
Verify system rejects invalid intensity value with validation error

title: Appointment Scheduling with Conflict Prevention and Notifications
description: Verify appointment scheduling integrates calendar, prevents time conflicts, supports waiting list, and sends automatic notifications.

steps.description: Login as authorized user (Fisioterapeuta or Admin)
Schedule a new appointment using calendar interface
Verify new appointment is created on calendar
Attempt to schedule overlapping appointment
Verify system prevents conflict and prompts user
Add patient to waiting list for a fully booked time slot
Verify waiting list entry is saved and displayed
Trigger appointment notification (reminder)
Verify notification is sent automatically to patient and staff

title: Session Documentation including Pain Levels, Procedures and Exercise Prescription
description: Verify recording session notes with pain levels, procedures performed and prescribing exercises with follow-up scheduling option.

steps.description: Login as Fisioterapeuta
Access patient session documentation screen
Record session details including pain level and performed procedures
Prescribe exercises from exercise library
Schedule follow-up session if needed
Verify all recorded data is saved and linked to patient record
Attempt to input invalid pain level value
Verify validation error prevents invalid entry

title: Exercise Library Access, Search and Creation
description: Verify exercise library is accessible, supports search and filtering by body region and type, and allows creation of new exercises with video and difficulty level.

steps.description: Login as Fisioterapeuta
Navigate to exercise library
Search exercises by name, body region and type
Verify search filters return correct exercise lists
Add new exercise with video demonstration and difficulty level
Verify new exercise persists and is searchable

title: Personalized Exercise Prescription and Patient Portal Tracking
description: Verify personalized exercise prescription is delivered to patient portal and patient adherence can be reported and tracked.

steps.description: As Fisioterapeuta, prescribe exercises to patient
Patient logs into portal and views prescribed exercises
Verify exercises are displayed with instructions and videos
Patient submits feedback/report on exercise adherence
Verify feedback is recorded and visible to physiotherapist

title: Dashboards Display Correct Data per User Role
description: Verify each user role dashboard loads with correct personalized KPIs and metrics relevant to the role.

steps.description: Login as Admin and access dashboard
Verify Admin dashboard shows user invitations, system reports and overall metrics
Login as Fisioterapeuta and access dashboard
Verify physiotherapist dashboard shows patient stats, upcoming appointments and session data
Login as Estagiario and access dashboard
Verify intern dashboard shows limited data aligned with access permissions
Login as Paciente and access dashboard
Verify patient dashboard shows treatment plans and adherence reports

title: Clinical and Financial Reports Generation and PDF Export
description: Verify reports are generated with accurate data and can be exported in PDF and professional formats.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Generate clinical report with selected filters
Verify report displays accurate clinical data
Export clinical report to PDF
Verify PDF is generated correctly and content matches displayed report
Generate financial report and export as PDF
Verify financial data is accurate and PDF export functions

title: Data Security and LGPD Compliance - Encryption and Audit Trails
description: Verify sensitive data is encrypted at rest and audit trails record all data changes for compliance with LGPD.

steps.description: Create or update sensitive patient data
Verify data is encrypted in database storage
Trigger data modifications and deletions
Verify audit logs capture all user actions with timestamps and identity

title: UI Components Accessibility and Brazilian Localization
description: Verify UI components use Radix UI and Tailwind CSS, are accessible and properly localized for Brazilian Portuguese including forms and labels.

steps.description: Navigate through key UI components like forms, dialogs, buttons and menus
Verify components are keyboard accessible and screen reader friendly
Verify all labels, placeholders and messages are in Brazilian Portuguese and culturally appropriate

title: Error Handling and Validation Feedback
description: Verify centralized error handling returns clear, user-friendly messages and validations prevent incorrect data submissions on all forms.

steps.description: Submit forms with missing or invalid data (e.g., CPF format, required fields)
Verify validation errors are displayed next to fields with contextual messages
Simulate server errors (e.g., database outage) during operations
Verify user receives clear error notifications without sensitive details

title: End-to-End Workflow: Patient Registration, Body Mapping, Appointment and Session Documentation
description: Verify an end-to-end workflow from patient registration, assigning therapist, recording pain points, scheduling appointment, to documenting session with exercise prescription.

steps.description: Login as Admin and create new patient with valid data
Login as Fisioterapeuta and assign patient
Record pain points on body map for patient
Schedule appointment for patient and therapist
During session, document procedures, pain levels and prescribe exercises
Verify all steps link correctly and data is consistent in patient profile

title: API Contract Tests for Patient and Appointment Endpoints
description: Verify all REST API endpoints for patients and appointments adhere to contract specifications and handle errors gracefully.

steps.description: Send valid API requests for patient creation, update, retrieval and deletion
Verify responses meet schema requirements and data correctness
Send invalid API requests (e.g., malformed CPF, missing fields)
Verify errors are returned with appropriate HTTP status codes and messages
Send conflicting appointment schedule requests
Verify conflict detection and proper error response
